page.title: 01A BRIEF INTRODUCTION
page.content: Rural describes our area - 65 miles from London and 15 miles north of Eastbourne. Nearest market town is Hailsham, 7 miles away.Our hamlets are Bodle Street or Bodle Street Green in the west of the area, Ponts Green and Brownbread Street in the east,part of the straggling village of Ashbounham. The main road pattern is from north to south. The land rises and falls in every directon and probably the thing shared by every person here is a splendid view over miles of open country. In summer, everywhere you look there are trees,not extensive woodlands, but thick hedges and clumps of trees surrounding ponds and thin straggling woods following the courses of the steeply sided streams. The soil,mostly clay,but odd patches of sand and sandstone.
